generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, flanked by parked cars and buildings.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible walking on the pavement next to parked cars and buildings, indicating a designated pedestrian area.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with various architectural styles and commercial signage (e.g., "GALERIA") line both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along the street, particularly on the right side.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast or cloudy.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk, including one person standing next to an open car trunk and others further down the street.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the street, including sedans, vans, and a small white car in the foreground.
- truck: A red truck is parked on the right side of the street, partially obscured by other vehicles.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including parking signs and directional signs mounted on poles along the street.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs along the street.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible mounted on a pole on the left side of the street.
